description: Detailed 3ds max modeling course. This course is designed to teach whole modeling process of subway train interior step by step. We will cover the modeling of every single part of train. Course shows polygonal and spline modeling techniques. Student will learn how to model clean shapes of anything they want. At the end of this course we will move on to lighting process. Vray lights will be our choice. After adjusting our lights we will do some test renders and finish our course.
title: 3ds max making of subway train
